title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added GitHub Mobile support for Copilot agents: assign issues, create PRs, track sessions. Fixed Copilot icon aria-labels.
Documented self-deletion of Stripe Connect accounts for Sponsors, including screenshots.
Added warning to shut down or delete old appliances after HA failover to prevent conflicts.
Updated changelog with Copilot agent flexibility (cross-repo assignments) and MCP Registry details.
Redirected old Copilot agent enabling path to updated article.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added GitHub Mobile support for Copilot agents: assign issues, create PRs, track sessions. Fixed Copilot icon aria-labels.
- Documented self-deletion of Stripe Connect accounts for Sponsors, including screenshots.
- Added warning to shut down or delete old appliances after HA failover to prevent conflicts.
- Updated changelog with Copilot agent flexibility (cross-repo assignments) and MCP Registry details.
